description:
After continually being mistaken for the Great King Enma, King Shinko muses about how he should differ himself to avoid future confusion with the deceased.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Oko no Takamura / La vie d’Enma
Ono no Takamura / Enma-daiou to Itsuwa
Ono no Takamura / Stories of Great King Enma
小野篁 / 閻魔大王と逸話
